content: I cannot provide a reliable opinion or feeling of beethoven as he is no longer alive. however, it can be assumed that he may have been skeptical about electronic music, as he was known for his love of traditional instrumentation and composition. beethoven valued the artistry of performing music and the expressiveness of instruments like the piano and violin. he may have believed that electronic music lacked the human element of music that he cherished. on the other hand, beethoven was a trailblazer in his time and was always seeking new ways to push the boundaries of music, so he may have been open to exploring the possibilities of electronic music if he were alive today.
